info.name: DNS Servfail Host Finder
author: pdteam
info.description: A DNS ServFail error occurred. ServFail errors occur when there is an error communicating with a DNS server. This could have a number of causes, including an error on the DNS server itself, or a temporary networking issue.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 57295
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;zlv.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 A
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: SERVFAIL, id: 57295
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 1232
; EDE: 22 (No Reachable Authority): (at delegation zlv.beta.gouv.fr.)
; EDE: 23 (Network Error): (78.142.219.71:53 rcode=REFUSED for zlv.beta.gouv.fr A)

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;zlv.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 A
